DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effect Multiple Doses Isavuconazole Pharmacokinetics Single Dose Sirolimus Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects receive single dose sirolimus Day 1 follow 21 day wash-out period ( time sirolimus dose isavuconazole dosing ) . On Days 22 23 , isavuconazole dose three time daily ( TID ) . On Days 24 34 , isavuconazole administer daily ( QD ) . All subject administer single dose sirolimus Day 26 .
